programme.title: James Prior
programme.short_synopsis: Michael Parkinson's castaway is MP James Prior
programme.medium_synopsis: Michael Parkinson's castaway is MP James Prior.
programme.long_synopsis:
The Rt Hon James Prior MP manages to combine his parliamentary work with being the Chairman of the General Electric Company. In conversation with Michael Parkinson, he recalls organising a pig club at school during the war and talks about his career in farming and the eventual emergence of politics as his overriding interest.

[Taken from the original programme material for this archive edition of Desert Island Discs]

programme.title: Desert Island Discs
programme.short_synopsis: Kirsty Young invites her castaway guests to share the soundtrack of their lives.
